import React from 'react'; import styles from './aboutUs.module.css'; // Import images from the pages folder import member1 from './member1.jpg'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About Senpai Suggests

Senpai Suggests is a platform dedicated to anime lovers, providing personalized recommendations and allowing users to explore new shows based on their interests. Our goal is to create a fun and engaging experience where every user can discover anime they'll love.

Meet the Team

Member 1 Name

Member 1 is responsible for front-end development and loves working on user interface design to enhance the user experience.

Member 2 Name

Member 2 focuses on back-end development, handling database management and ensuring the platform runs smoothly.

Member 3 Name

Member 3 specializes in data science, using algorithms and analytics to provide accurate anime recommendations for users.

); }; export default AboutUs;
